soccer.title: Football (Soccer)
soccer.description: This is the first sport I played as a child, and it's still my favorite.

programming.title: Programming
programming.description: At home, I code in my free time. I mostly work on websites, but recently gotten into dekstop apps.

kendama.description: A traditional Japanese skill toy that challenges hand-eye coordination.

juggling.title: Juggling
juggling.description: I started juggling because it was related to Kendama.

tableTennis.title: Table Tennis
tableTennis.description: I started playing table tennis when I came to New Zealand.

shorinjiKempo.title: Shorinji Kempo
shorinjiKempo.description: A Japanese martial art focusing on self-defense and personal development.

tennis.title: Tennis
tennis.description: I enjoyed playing it because it was similar to table tennis, and it was easy for me to get into it.

basketball.title: Basketball
basketball.description: I played this with my friends in my intermediate school.

softball.title: Softball
softball.description: I've played in one casual competition, and enjoyed it.

badminton.title: Badminton
badminton.description: I played casual badminton at high school, and I really enjoyed it. It's also similar to table tennis.

noteRss.description: This is an RSS article list from Note for my younger brother.

tauriClipboardManager.description: A revolutionary clipboard manager built with Tauri that can search images.

hideTwitterBots.description: This is a Chrome extension for hiding Twitter bots.

events.title: Moved to Ehime
events.description: After the earthquake, I moved to my mother's hometown in Ehime.

events.title: Went to New Zealand
events.description: I went to New Zealand and went to local junior high school in Auckland.

events.title: Went to The Philippines
events.description: I went to The Philippines and went to English School for 3 months, then went to local junior high school for a year in Cebu.

events.title: Went back to New Zealand
events.description: I went to high school in Auckland. I went to this high school for 5 years.

events.title: Injury from playing soccer
events.description:
Anterior cruciate ligament tear (ACL)
Started going to Physio.

events.title: ACL 2nd time
events.description:
After going to physio for half a year, I've almost recovered and started doing some light sports.
This resulted in a 2nd ACL.

events.title: Back to Japan for the first time in 5 years!
events.description:
I went back to Japan for the first time in 5 years! I have visited 4 companies:
- Microsoft
- HENNGE
- Cybozu
- Soulware

events.title: Got into University of Auckland
events.description:
I graduated from high school and got into University of Auckland.
I'm majoring in Computer Science and IT Management.

events.title: Knee injury the 3rd time
events.description: I injured my knee again playing futsal.
